name: Toll Bridge
description:
Event Plentiful Harvest:
You receive 2 gold.

name: Abbey
description:
Progress is not the only thing here;
you also get red wine and lots of dark beer.

name: Marketplace
description:
If a production number is rolled that appears more frequently
on your oppponent's regions than on yours, you receive 1 resource.
Choose a resource your opponent can normally receive.

name: Parish Hall
description:
You pay only 1 resource for choosing
a card from a draw stack.

name: Storehouse
description:
Do not count the resources on the 2 neighboring
regions when the event Brigand Attack is rolled.

name: Brick Factory
description:
Doubles the brick production
of the neighboring hills

name: Grain Mill
description:
Doubles the grain production
of the neighboring fields

name: Iron Foundry
description:
Doubles the ore production
of the neighboring mountains

name: Lumber Camp
description:
Doubles the lumber production
of the neighboring forests

name: Weaver Shop
description:
Doubles the wool production
of the neighboring pastures
